from collections import defaultdict, Counter, namedtuple

# defaultdict example
word_count = defaultdict(int)
for word in ['apple', 'banana', 'apple']:
    word_count[word] += 1

# Counter example
counter = Counter(['a', 'b', 'a', 'c', 'a', 'b'])
most_common = counter.most_common(2)

# namedtuple example
Point = namedtuple('Point', ['x', 'y'])
p = Point(10, 20)
